**Days Gone (Video Game)**

Days Gone is an action-adventure game released in 2019 for PlayStation 4 and later for Windows. Set in a zombie-filled post-apocalyptic Oregon, players control Deacon St. John, a drifter searching for his missing wife. The game lets you explore an open world, fight enemies with various weapons, and use stealth. Deacon's motorcycle is key for traveling.

Inspired by stories like *The Walking Dead*, it took six years to make. Critics liked its looks and gameplay but criticized some missions and technical problems. Despite this, it sold very well. A sequel was considered but not made.
